name: God's Will Be Done
description:
You play as a character who kills people because God tells him to. You're God's champion. Along the way you'll also meet a woman named Meredith who is a very kind and down-to-earth police officer. You eat eggs with her at the diner almost every morning and you don't know why. There are choices to be made, Barney Fife impersonators to suffer through, eggs to eat, and blood to spill.

"Beautiful. Just Beautiful."

-My friend Andy

"Well that was... dark, I liked it though"

-Forum Dweller
